title: CMake Error at third_party/sleef/CMakeLists.txt:27 (message):   SLEEF does not allow in-source builds.
body_html:
I follow the caffe2's installation description, when I run python setup.py install , the error occured:

-- Using python found in /usr/bin/python
CMake Error at third_party/sleef/CMakeLists.txt:27 (message):
  SLEEF does not allow in-source builds.

  You can refer to doc/build-with-cmake.md for instructions on how provide a
  separate build directory.  Note: Please remove autogenerated file
  `CMakeCache.txt` and directory `CMakeFiles` in the current directory.


-- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!
See also "/media/wrp/gutaipan/pytorch/CMakeFiles/CMakeOutput.log".
See also "/media/wrp/gutaipan/pytorch/CMakeFiles/CMakeError.log".
Failed to run 'bash ../tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh --use-cuda --use-nnpack --use-qnnpack caffe2'

And my cmake version is 3.9.4
The cmake with 3.5.1 version can also cause this error.
Can anyone help me?
Thank you very much!

body:
I follow the caffe2's installation description, when I run `python setup.py install` , the error occured:
```
-- Using python found in /usr/bin/python
CMake Error at third_party/sleef/CMakeLists.txt:27 (message):
  SLEEF does not allow in-source builds.

  You can refer to doc/build-with-cmake.md for instructions on how provide a
  separate build directory.  Note: Please remove autogenerated file
  `CMakeCache.txt` and directory `CMakeFiles` in the current directory.


-- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!
See also "/media/wrp/gutaipan/pytorch/CMakeFiles/CMakeOutput.log".
See also "/media/wrp/gutaipan/pytorch/CMakeFiles/CMakeError.log".
Failed to run 'bash ../tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh --use-cuda --use-nnpack --use-qnnpack caffe2'

```

And my cmake version is 3.9.4
The cmake with 3.5.1 version can also cause this error.
Can anyone help me?
Thank you very much!
